# BIRD-INTERACT 1.0

Content: ## ‚ö†Ô∏è Announcement Please note that before your evaluation process, when Docker loads the databases, errors may occasionally occur due to environment inconsistency (these will not terminate the process but will appear in the Docker logs). As a result, some databases may fail to load properly, leading to empty databases. This will cause the evaluation results to be abnormally low. üëâ Therefore, we strongly recommend checking the Docker logs for any errors **before running the evaluation** and verifying that all databases have been successfully loaded. üëâ We have updated the **Submission Guidelines**, where the customized agent scaffolds are supported. Please feel free to take a look at our detailed submission guidelines [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1F1DSqHDBzGvXFlWU8iCl9otkqxIefgcH/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=108161566779099489782&rtpof=true&sd=true). ## üì∞ News - [2026-02-08] üî•üî•üî• Our **[Bird-Interact paper](https://huggingface.co/papers/2510.05318)** has beed accepted at **ICLR 2026 (Oral)**! See you in Rio üáßüá∑! - [2025-11-06] üêõ **Bug Fix** & üê≥ **Docker update**: Update the sqlglot version to 26.16.4 to fix the bug that the sql parser cannot parse the SQL correctly for user simulator. You could fix this by re-install it by `pip install sqlglot==26.16.4` in the `bird_interact_eval` env. The `bird_interact_eval` image is also updated, so you could also pull it and recreate the `bird_interact_eval` container. - [2025-10-21] üê≥ **Docker update**: We added the docker for Full DB Env. And we pushed 3 docker images (Base/Full DB Env and the evaluation environment for both `a-Interact` and `c-Interact`) to Docker Hub to facilitate the environment setup. No need to download the DB dumps and build the images manually! - [2025-10-08] üìù Our **[Bird-Interact paper](https://huggingface.co/papers/2510.05318)** is now publicly available! It presents the full details, methodology, and evaluation of our interactive text-to-SQL benchmark. üëâ Check it out and know more about the ideas behind [BIRD-Interact](https://bird-interact.github.io/). - [2025-08-26] üöÄ We're excited to announce the release of the **[BIRD-Interact-Full (600)](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-full)** set! It's a tough one ‚Äî the best LLMs are only achieving a **16.33%** success rate, with just **10.0%** on the `c-interact` and `a-interact` portions. üëâ For more details, please visit our [project website](https://bird-interact.github.io/).
Translation: ## ‚ö†Ô∏è Aviso Por favor, observe que antes do processo de avalia√ß√£o, quando o Docker carrega os bancos de dados, erros podem ocasionalmente ocorrer devido √† inconsist√™ncia do ambiente (eles n√£o encerram o processo, mas aparecem nos logs do Docker). Como resultado, alguns bancos de dados podem falhar ao carregar corretamente, levando a bancos de dados vazios. Isso far√° com que os resultados da avalia√ß√£o sejam anormalmente baixos. üëâ Portanto, recomendamos fortemente verificar os logs do Docker em busca de erros **antes de executar a avalia√ß√£o** e garantir que todos os bancos de dados foram carregados com sucesso. üëâ Atualizamos as **Diretrizes de Submiss√£o**, onde s√£o suportados scaffolds de agentes personalizados. Sinta-se √† vontade para conferir nossas diretrizes detalhadas de submiss√£o [aqui](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1F1DSqHDBzGvXFlWU8iCl9otkqxIefgcH/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=108161566779099489782&rtpof=true&sd=true). ## üì∞ Not√≠cias - [2026-02-08] üî•üî•üî• Nosso **[artigo Bird-Interact](https://huggingface.co/papers/2510.05318)** foi aceito na **ICLR 2026 (Oral)**! Nos vemos no Rio üáßüá∑! - [2025-11-06] üêõ **Corre√ß√£o de Bug** & üê≥ **Atualiza√ß√£o Docker**: Atualize a vers√£o do sqlglot para 26.16.4 para corrigir o bug em que o parser SQL n√£o consegue analisar o SQL corretamente para o simulador de usu√°rio. Voc√™ pode corrigir isso reinstalando com `pip install sqlglot==26.16.4` no ambiente `bird_interact_eval`. A imagem `bird_interact_eval` tamb√©m foi atualizada, ent√£o voc√™ pode pux√°-la e recriar o container `bird_interact_eval`. - [2025-10-21] üê≥ **Atualiza√ß√£o Docker**: Adicionamos o docker para Full DB Env. E enviamos 3 imagens docker (Base/Full DB Env e o ambiente de avalia√ß√£o para ambos `a-Interact` e `c-Interact`) ao Docker Hub para facilitar a configura√ß√£o do ambiente. N√£o √© necess√°rio baixar os dumps dos bancos de dados e construir as imagens manualmente! - [2025-10-08] üìù Nosso **[artigo Bird-Interact](https://huggingface.co/papers/2510.05318)** agora est√° dispon√≠vel publicamente! Apresenta todos os detalhes, metodologia e avalia√ß√£o do nosso benchmark interativo de text-to-SQL. üëâ Confira e saiba mais sobre as ideias por tr√°s do [BIRD-Interact](https://bird-interact.github.io/). - [2025-08-26] üöÄ Estamos animados para anunciar o lan√ßamento do conjunto **[BIRD-Interact-Full (600)](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-full)**! √â um desafio ‚Äî os melhores LLMs est√£o alcan√ßando apenas **16,33%** de taxa de sucesso, com apenas **10,0%** nas partes `c-interact` e `a-interact`. üëâ Para mais detalhes, visite nosso [site do projeto](https://bird-interact.github.io/).

As a result, some databases may fail to load properly, leading to empty databases. This will cause the evaluation results to be abnormally low.

Como resultado, alguns bancos de dados podem falhar ao carregar corretamente, levando a bancos de dados vazios. Isso far√° com que os resultados da avalia√ß√£o sejam anormalmente baixos.

Content:
- [2025-08-26] üì¨ We'll be sending the **Ground Truth & Test cases** to our mailing list this week. If you want early access, please send an email as instructed on the site for an **automatic download**. - [2025-08-26] üíæ On another note, we've also released a SQLite version of **[LiveSQLBench-Lite](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/livesqlbench-base-lite-sqlite)** for easier local research. The full **LiveSQLBench-Base** and **-Large** versions are coming soon! - [2025-08-22] **Bug Fix**: In Bird-Interact-Agent code, we fixed a bug that when evaluating phase-2 SQL, the stored phase-1 SQL cannot be executed successfully, leading to a lower success rate of Phase-2. This bug only affects those tasks where phase1 sql does some operations on the database, e.g. CREATE table, etc. ## üß∏ Overview BIRD-INTERACT, an interactive text-to-SQL benchmark, **re-imagines Text-to-SQL evaluation via lens of dynamic interactions**. The environment blends a hierarchical knowledge base, database documentation and a function-driven user simulator to recreate authentic enterprise environments across full **CRUD** operations. It offers two rigorous test modes: (1) passive **Conversational Interaction** and (2) active **Agentic Interaction**, spanning 600 annotated tasks including Business Intelligence (BI), CRUD operations and etc., each guarded by executable test cases. Typical evaluations trigger 1,968-5,496 interaction turns between model and user simulator, while state-of-the-art reasoning models currently solve only **‚âà24%** and **‚âà18%** of tasks, underscoring the benchmark's challenge.

### ‚úÖ Two Evaluation Modes BIRD-INTERACT supports two evaluation modes as mentioned above: - **c-Interact**: Conversational Interaction which is a passive mode and the workflow is fixed. The code and detailed information can be found in `bird_interact_conv`. - **a-Interact**: Agentic Interaction which is an embodied active mode where the workflow is dynamic and led by models. The code and detailed information can be found in `bird_interact_agent`. ### üê£ Lite Version We are releasing a lite version of BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-lite-exp`, which includes 270 high-quality real-world tasks specifically for PostgreSQL. This is a good starting point for quick experimentation. ### ü¶ú Full Version The full version of BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-full`, is a comprehensive benchmark that includes 600 tasks for PostgreSQL. It covers a wide range of SQL operations and user queries. The full version is coming soon. ### Model Performance Results on BIRD-INTERACT-FULL #### 1. **c-Interact Text-to-SQL** Performance | Rank | Model Name | Normalized Reward | Avg Cost (USD)/Task | Level |
Translation:
- [2025-08-26] üì¨ Estaremos enviando os **Casos de Verifica√ß√£o & Testes** para nossa lista de e-mails esta semana. Se quiser acesso antecipado, envie um e-mail conforme instru√≠do no site para um **download autom√°tico**. - [2025-08-26] üíæ Em outra nota, tamb√©m lan√ßamos uma vers√£o SQLite do **[LiveSQLBench-Lite](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/livesqlbench-base-lite-sqlite)** para facilitar pesquisas locais. As vers√µes completas **LiveSQLBench-Base** e **-Large** estar√£o dispon√≠veis em breve! - [2025-08-22] **Corre√ß√£o de Bug**: No c√≥digo Bird-Interact-Agent, corrigimos um erro que, ao avaliar o SQL da fase-2, o SQL armazenado da fase-1 n√£o podia ser executado com sucesso, levando a uma menor taxa de sucesso da Fase-2. Esse bug afeta apenas tarefas em que o sql da fase1 faz opera√ß√µes no banco de dados, como CREATE table, etc. ## üß∏ Vis√£o Geral BIRD-INTERACT, um benchmark interativo de text-to-SQL, **reimagina a avalia√ß√£o Text-to-SQL pelo vi√©s de intera√ß√µes din√¢micas**. O ambiente mistura uma base de conhecimento hier√°rquica, documenta√ß√£o de banco de dados e um simulador de usu√°rio orientado a fun√ß√µes para recriar ambientes empresariais aut√™nticos em todas as opera√ß√µes **CRUD**. Oferece dois modos rigorosos de teste: (1) **Intera√ß√£o Conversacional** passiva e (2) **Intera√ß√£o Ag√™ntica** ativa, abrangendo 600 tarefas anotadas incluindo Intelig√™ncia de Neg√≥cios (BI), opera√ß√µes CRUD, etc., cada uma protegida por casos de teste execut√°veis. Avalia√ß√µes t√≠picas disparam de 1.968 a 5.496 turnos de intera√ß√£o entre modelo e simulador de usu√°rio, enquanto modelos de racioc√≠nio de √∫ltima gera√ß√£o atualmente resolvem apenas **‚âà24%** e **‚âà18%** das tarefas, destacando o desafio do benchmark.

### ‚úÖ Dois Modos de Avalia√ß√£o O BIRD-INTERACT suporta dois modos de avalia√ß√£o conforme mencionado acima: - **c-Interact**: Intera√ß√£o Conversacional, que √© um modo passivo e o fluxo de trabalho √© fixo. O c√≥digo e informa√ß√µes detalhadas podem ser encontrados em `bird_interact_conv`. - **a-Interact**: Intera√ß√£o Ag√™ntica, que √© um modo ativo incorporado onde o fluxo de trabalho √© din√¢mico e liderado pelos modelos. O c√≥digo e informa√ß√µes detalhadas podem ser encontrados em `bird_interact_agent`. ### üê£ Vers√£o Lite Estamos lan√ßando uma vers√£o lite do BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-lite-exp`, que inclui 270 tarefas reais de alta qualidade especificamente para PostgreSQL. √â um bom ponto de partida para experimenta√ß√£o r√°pida. ### ü¶ú Vers√£o Completa A vers√£o completa do BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-full`, √© um benchmark abrangente que inclui 600 tarefas para PostgreSQL. Ela cobre uma ampla gama de opera√ß√µes SQL e consultas de usu√°rios. A vers√£o completa estar√° dispon√≠vel em breve. ### Resultados de Desempenho de Modelos no BIRD-INTERACT-FULL #### 1. **c-Interact Text-to-SQL** Desempenho | Rank | Nome do Modelo | Recompensa Normalizada | Custo M√©dio (USD)/Tarefa | N√≠vel |

RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **c-Interact**: Intera√ß√£o Conversacional, que √© um modo passivo e o fluxo de trabalho √© fixo. O c√≥digo e informa√ß√µes detalhadas podem ser encontrados em `bird_interact_conv`.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **a-Interact**: Agentic Interaction which is an embodied active mode where the workflow is dynamic and led by models. The code and detailed information can be found in `bird_interact_agent`.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **a-Interact**: Intera√ß√£o Ag√™ntica, que √© um modo ativo incorporado onde o fluxo de trabalho √© din√¢mico e liderado pelos modelos. O c√≥digo e informa√ß√µes detalhadas podem ser encontrados em `bird_interact_agent`.

RowTranslations.originContent: We are releasing a lite version of BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-lite-exp`, which includes 270 high-quality real-world tasks specifically for PostgreSQL. This is a good starting point for quick experimentation.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Estamos lan√ßando uma vers√£o lite do BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-lite-exp`, que inclui 270 tarefas reais de alta qualidade especificamente para PostgreSQL. √â um bom ponto de partida para experimenta√ß√£o r√°pida.

RowTranslations.originContent: The full version of BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-full`, is a comprehensive benchmark that includes 600 tasks for PostgreSQL. It covers a wide range of SQL operations and user queries. The full version is coming soon.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: A vers√£o completa do BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-full`, √© um benchmark abrangente que inclui 600 tarefas para PostgreSQL. Ela cobre uma ampla gama de opera√ß√µes SQL e consultas de usu√°rios. A vers√£o completa estar√° dispon√≠vel em breve.

RowTranslations.translatedContent: | Rank | Nome do Modelo     | Recompensa Normalizada | Custo M√©dio (USD)/Tarefa | N√≠vel              |

Content:
|:----:|:-------------------|:-----------------:|:-------------------:|:------------------:| | 1 | Gemini-2.5-Pro | 20.92 | $0.04 | üèÜ Excellent Chat | | 2 | O3-Mini | 20.27 | $0.07 | üèÜ Excellent Chat | | 3 | Claude-Sonnet-4 | 18.35 | $0.29 | üíé Good Chat | | 4 | Qwen-3-Coder-480B | 17.75 | $0.11 | üíé Good Chat | | 5 | Deepseek-Chat-V3.1 | 15.15 | $0.12 | ‚ú® Standard | | 6 | Claude-Sonnet-3.7 | 13.87 | $0.29 | ‚ú® Standard | | 7 | GPT-5 | 12.58 | $0.08 | ‚ö™ Basic | #### 2. **a-Interact Text-to-SQL** Performance | Rank | Model Name | Normalized Reward | Avg Cost (USD)/Task | Level | |:----:|:-------------------|:-----------------:|:-------------------:|:------------------------:| | 1 | GPT-5 | 25.52 | $0.24 | üèÜ Excellent Interaction | | 2 | Claude-Sonnet-4 | 23.28 | $0.51 | üèÜ Excellent Interaction | | 3 | Claude-Sonnet-3.7 | 17.45 | $0.60 | üíé Good Interaction | | 4 | Gemini-2.5-Pro | 17.33 | $0.22 | üíé Good Interaction | | 5 | O3-Mini | 16.43 | $0.06 | ‚ú® Standard | | 6 | Deepseek-Chat-V3.1 | 13.47 | $0.06 | ‚ú® Standard | | 7 | Qwen-3-Coder-480B | 10.58 | $0.07 | ‚ö™ Basic | > \* Budget Parameters: Starting Budget/User Patience Budget, measured by our virtual currency *bird-coin*s . Refer to [bird_interact_agent/README.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/bird_interact_agent/README.md#task-setting) for more details. ### Interaction-Time Scaling (ITS) Interaction-Time Scaling (ITS) refers to a model's ability to continuously increase its end performance through multi-turn interactions. When this interactive performance surpasses the model's idealized single-turn performance on a fully specified, unambiguous task, we say it satisfies the **ITS law**. As user patience grows and interaction turns accumulate, performance keeps improving, demonstrating that the model can sustain effective communication over extended dialogue. Currently, we only find claude-3-7-sonnet satisfies the ITS law.

Consulte [bird_interact_agent/README.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/bird_interact_agent/README.md#task-setting) para mais detalhes. ### Escalonamento do Tempo de Intera√ß√£o (ITS) O Escalonamento do Tempo de Intera√ß√£o (ITS) refere-se √† capacidade de um modelo de aumentar continuamente seu desempenho final por meio de intera√ß√µes multi-turno. Quando esse desempenho interativo supera o desempenho idealizado de turno √∫nico do modelo em uma tarefa totalmente especificada e n√£o amb√≠gua, dizemos que ele satisfaz a **lei ITS**. √Ä medida que a paci√™ncia do usu√°rio aumenta e as intera√ß√µes se acumulam, o desempenho continua a melhorar, demonstrando que o modelo pode sustentar uma comunica√ß√£o eficaz em di√°logos prolongados. Atualmente, apenas o claude-3-7-sonnet satisfaz a lei ITS.

RowTranslations.originContent: 1. Run Docker containers for bird-interact-lite database, bird-interact-full database, and evaluation environment:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 1. Execute os containers Docker para o banco de dados bird-interact-lite, banco de dados bird-interact-full e ambiente de avalia√ß√£o:

RowTranslations.originContent: > If you just want to evaluate on `bird-interact-lite`, you could comment out the [`postgresql_full` service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/./env/docker-compose.yml#L21-L31) in `docker-compose.yml` to speed up the environment setup.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: > Se voc√™ quiser apenas avaliar em `bird-interact-lite`, pode comentar o servi√ßo [`postgresql_full`](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/./env/docker-compose.yml#L21-L31) em `docker-compose.yml` para agilizar a configura√ß√£o do ambiente.

Content:
```bash
   cd env
   docker compose pull 
   docker compose up -d
   ```
Translation:
```bash
   cd env
   docker compose pull 
   docker compose up -d
   ```

Content:
Wait for several minutes for database initialization. 
   
  You could track the building progress by:
Translation:
Aguarde alguns minutos para a inicializa√ß√£o do banco de dados.
   
  Voc√™ pode acompanhar o progresso da constru√ß√£o por:

```bash

  ```

Content: If you have created containers before and want to recreate it, you could run the following command:
Translation: Se voc√™ j√° criou cont√™ineres antes e deseja recri√°-los, pode executar o seguinte comando:

Content:
```bash
  docker compose down -v # this cmd removes the containers and the volumes
  docker compose pull   # pull the latest images from Docker Hub
  docker compose up -d --force-recreate # build and start the containers again. --force-recreate means force the recreation of the containers. 
  # Or `docker compose up -d --force-recreate bird_interact_eval` to only recreate the bird_interact_eval container about evalution code environment.
  ```
Translation:
```bash
  docker compose down -v # this cmd removes the containers and the volumes
  docker compose pull   # pull the latest images from Docker Hub
  docker compose up -d --force-recreate # build and start the containers again. --force-recreate means force the recreation of the containers. 
  # Or `docker compose up -d --force-recreate bird_interact_eval` to only recreate the bird_interact_eval container about evalution code environment.
  ```

Content:
This runs 3 containers using prebuilt images from Docker Hub:
   - `bird_interact_postgresql`: PostgreSQL database for bird-interact-lite
   - `bird_interact_postgresql_full`: PostgreSQL database for bird-interact-full
   - `bird_interact_eval`: Evaluation environment for both `a-Interact` and `c-Interact`.

   Now, you could start the evaluation environment by executing the following command:
Translation:
Isso executa 3 containers usando imagens pr√©-constru√≠das do Docker Hub:
   - `bird_interact_postgresql`: Banco de dados PostgreSQL para bird-interact-lite
   - `bird_interact_postgresql_full`: Banco de dados PostgreSQL para bird-interact-full
   - `bird_interact_eval`: Ambiente de avalia√ß√£o para ambos `a-Interact` e `c-Interact`.

   Agora, voc√™ pode iniciar o ambiente de avalia√ß√£o executando o seguinte comando:

Content:
```bash
   docker compose exec bird_interact_eval bash
   ```
Translation:
```bash
   docker compose exec bird_interact_eval bash
   ```

Content:
2. (Optional) Build the environment manually (if you want to build the images from scratch): 
   - Downdload the database dumps 
      - [bird-interact-lite](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QIGQlRKbkqApAOrQXPqFJgUg8rQ7HRRZ/view). Unzip and rename it as `env/postgre_table_dumps`.
      - [bird-interact-full](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1V9SFIWebi27JtaDUAScG1xE9ELbYcWLR/view). Unzip and rename it as `env/postgre_table_dumps_full`.
   - Build the environment manually by running `docker-compose.build.yml`.
Translation:
2. (Opcional) Construa o ambiente manualmente (se quiser criar as imagens do zero): 
   - Baixe os dumps do banco de dados 
      - [bird-interact-lite](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QIGQlRKbkqApAOrQXPqFJgUg8rQ7HRRZ/view). Extraia e renomeie como `env/postgre_table_dumps`.
      - [bird-interact-full](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1V9SFIWebi27JtaDUAScG1xE9ELbYcWLR/view). Extraia e renomeie como `env/postgre_table_dumps_full`.
   - Construa o ambiente manualmente executando `docker-compose.build.yml`.

Content:
```bash
      cd env/
      docker compose -f docker-compose.build.yml build
      docker compose -f docker-compose.build.yml up -d
      ```
Translation:
```bash
      cd env/
      docker compose -f docker-compose.build.yml build
      docker compose -f docker-compose.build.yml up -d
      ```

Content:
3. (Recommended) Check the database containers are built and running successfully.

-  Print the container build logs to ensure that the databases are built successfully without errors:
Translation:
3. (Recomendado) Verifique se os containers de banco de dados foram constru√≠dos e est√£o em execu√ß√£o com sucesso.

-  Imprima os logs de constru√ß√£o dos containers para garantir que os bancos de dados foram constru√≠dos com sucesso, sem erros:

Content:
```bash 
   docker logs bird_interact_postgresql > build_bird_interact_postgresql.log 2>&1
   docker logs bird_interact_postgresql_full > build_bird_interact_postgresql_full.log 2>&1
   ```
Translation:
```bash 
   docker logs bird_interact_postgresql > build_bird_interact_postgresql.log 2>&1
   docker logs bird_interact_postgresql_full > build_bird_interact_postgresql_full.log 2>&1
   ```

Content:
If errors occur, `"Errors occurred during import:"` will be printed in the log files.


-  Check if the database containers are in good shape.
   
   Use our provided Python script to verify database metadata:
Translation:
Se ocorrerem erros, `"Ocorreram erros durante a importa√ß√£o:"` ser√° impresso nos arquivos de log.


-  Verifique se os containers de banco de dados est√£o em bom estado.
   
   Use nosso script Python fornecido para verificar os metadados do banco de dados:

Content:
```bash
   docker compose exec bird_interact_eval bash
   cd /app/env
   python check_db_metadata.py --host bird_interact_postgresql
   python check_db_metadata.py --host bird_interact_postgresql_full
   ```
Translation:
```bash
   docker compose exec bird_interact_eval bash
   cd /app/env
   python check_db_metadata.py --host bird_interact_postgresql
   python check_db_metadata.py --host bird_interact_postgresql_full
   ```

Content:
Expected results:
   - **bird-interact-lite**: 
     - üìà Total Databases: 18
     - üìã Total Tables: 175
     - üî¢ Total Columns: 2286
     - üìà Avg Rows per Table: 1,038.48
     - üíæ Total Size: 207.15 MB (around)
   - **bird-interact-full**: 
     - üìà Total Databases: 22
     - üìã Total Tables: 244
     - üî¢ Total Columns: 2011
     - üìà Avg Rows per Table: 1,121.19
     - üíæ Total Size: 272.00 MB (around)


## üì¶ Dataset Details

### Dataset Description

- **Database:** The complete PostgreSQL database can be download from [bird-interact-lite](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QIGQlRKbkqApAOrQXPqFJgUg8rQ7HRRZ/view) and [bird-interact-full](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1V9SFIWebi27JtaDUAScG1xE9ELbYcWLR/view).
- **data:** Each data instance contain the following main parts:
   - `selected_database`: The name of the database.  
   - `query`: The unambiguous user query.  
   - `amb_user_query`: The user query with injected ambiguities.
   - `user_query_ambiguity`: The ambiguities injected into the user query.
   - `non_critical_ambiguity`: The non-critical ambiguities like order, limit, etc.
   - `knowledge_ambiguity`: The ambiguities created by masked external knowledges. 
   - `sol_sql`: The ground truth SQL solution.  
   - `preprocess_sql`: SQL queries to run before executing the solution or prediction.  
   - `clean_up_sql`: SQL queries to run after the test cases to revert any changes made to the database.  
   - `test_cases`: A set of test cases to validate the predicted corrected SQL.
   - `follow_up`: The labeled follow up questions.
   - `external_knowledge`: The external knowledge related to the specific task.

- **evaluation:** The evaluation code is available in the [`./evaluation`](./evaluation) directory.
- **Curated by:** BIRD Team & Google Cloud
- **License:** [cc-by-sa-4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/)
- **HuggingFace Dataset Card:** [bird-interact-lite](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-lite)
  and [bird-interact-full](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-full)
Translation:
Resultados esperados:
   - **bird-interact-lite**: 
     - üìà Total de Bancos de Dados: 18
     - üìã Total de Tabelas: 175
     - üî¢ Total de Colunas: 2286
     - üìà M√©dia de Linhas por Tabela: 1.038,48
     - üíæ Tamanho Total: 207,15 MB (aproximadamente)
   - **bird-interact-full**: 
     - üìà Total de Bancos de Dados: 22
     - üìã Total de Tabelas: 244
     - üî¢ Total de Colunas: 2011
     - üìà M√©dia de Linhas por Tabela: 1.121,19
     - üíæ Tamanho Total: 272,00 MB (aproximadamente)


## üì¶ Detalhes do Conjunto de Dados

### Descri√ß√£o do Conjunto de Dados

- **Banco de Dados:** O banco de dados PostgreSQL completo pode ser baixado em [bird-interact-lite](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QIGQlRKbkqApAOrQXPqFJgUg8rQ7HRRZ/view) e [bird-interact-full](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1V9SFIWebi27JtaDUAScG1xE9ELbYcWLR/view).
- **dados:** Cada inst√¢ncia de dados cont√©m as seguintes partes principais:
   - `selected_database`: O nome do banco de dados.  
   - `query`: A consulta do usu√°rio sem ambiguidades.  
   - `amb_user_query`: A consulta do usu√°rio com ambiguidades injetadas.
   - `user_query_ambiguity`: As ambiguidades injetadas na consulta do usu√°rio.
   - `non_critical_ambiguity`: Ambiguidades n√£o cr√≠ticas como ordem, limite, etc.
   - `knowledge_ambiguity`: Ambiguidades criadas pelo mascaramento de conhecimentos externos. 
   - `sol_sql`: A solu√ß√£o SQL ver√≠dica.  
   - `preprocess_sql`: Consultas SQL para executar antes da solu√ß√£o ou predi√ß√£o.  
   - `clean_up_sql`: Consultas SQL para executar ap√≥s os testes e reverter altera√ß√µes no banco.  
   - `test_cases`: Um conjunto de casos de teste para validar o SQL corrigido previsto.
   - `follow_up`: As perguntas de acompanhamento rotuladas.
   - `external_knowledge`: O conhecimento externo relacionado √† tarefa espec√≠fica.

- **avalia√ß√£o:** O c√≥digo de avalia√ß√£o est√° dispon√≠vel no diret√≥rio [`./evaluation`](./evaluation).
- **Curadoria:** Equipe BIRD & Google Cloud
- **Licen√ßa:** [cc-by-sa-4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/)
- **Cart√£o do Conjunto de Dados na HuggingFace:** [bird-interact-lite](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-lite)
  e [bird-interact-full](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-full)

Content:
### Dataset Uses

To avoid data leakage by auto-crawling, we do not include GT solution sqls and test cases along with data.
please email [bird.bench25@gmail.com](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/mailto:bird.bench25@gmail.com) with the tag `[bird-interact-lite GT&Test Cases]` or `[bird-interact-full GT&Test Cases]` in the title for ground truth and test cases for the bird-interact-lite or bird-interact-full dataset, which will be sent automatically.


### Combine the public data with the ground truth and test cases

Then use the following script to combine the public data with the ground truth and test cases:

Take the full version as an example:
(1) Run:
Translation:
### Usos do Conjunto de Dados

Para evitar vazamento de dados por auto-crawling, n√£o inclu√≠mos SQLs de solu√ß√£o GT e casos de teste juntamente com os dados.
por favor envie um e-mail para [bird.bench25@gmail.com](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/mailto:bird.bench25@gmail.com) com a tag `[bird-interact-lite GT&Test Cases]` ou `[bird-interact-full GT&Test Cases]` no t√≠tulo para obter a verdade de base e casos de teste para o conjunto de dados bird-interact-lite ou bird-interact-full, que ser√£o enviados automaticamente.


### Combine os dados p√∫blicos com a verdade de base e casos de teste

Em seguida, use o seguinte script para combinar os dados p√∫blicos com a verdade de base e casos de teste:

Pegue a vers√£o completa como exemplo:
(1) Execute:

Content:
```bash
python combine_public_with_gt.py /path/to/bird-interact-full/bird_interact_data.jsonl /path/to/bird_interact_full_gt_kg_testcases_08022.jsonl /path/to/bird_interact_data.jsonl  # bird_interact_full_gt_kg_testcases_08022.jsonl is the data of ground-truth fields, which is obtained by emailing us.
```
Translation:
```bash
python combine_public_with_gt.py /path/to/bird-interact-full/bird_interact_data.jsonl /path/to/bird_interact_full_gt_kg_testcases_08022.jsonl /path/to/bird_interact_data.jsonl  # bird_interact_full_gt_kg_testcases_08022.jsonl is the data of ground-truth fields, which is obtained by emailing us.
```

Content:
This will create a new file at `/path/to/bird_interact_data.jsonl` with the combined data. 

(2) Then replace the original public data with the combined data:
Translation:
Isso criar√° um novo arquivo em `/path/to/bird_interact_data.jsonl` com os dados combinados.

(2) Em seguida, substitua os dados p√∫blicos originais pelos dados combinados:

Content:
```bash
cp /path/to/bird_interact_data.jsonl /path/to/bird-interact-full/bird_interact_data.jsonl
```
Translation:
```bash
cp /path/to/bird_interact_data.jsonl /path/to/bird-interact-full/bird_interact_data.jsonl
```

Content:
Same for the other versions: bird-interact-lite, mini version, etc. Just set correct paths for the public data and the ground truth and test cases, and then replace the public data with the combined data.




<!-- ### Use the Dataset from HuggingFace

You can download the dataset from HuggingFace using the following command:
Translation:
O mesmo vale para as outras vers√µes: bird-interact-lite, vers√£o mini, etc. Basta definir os caminhos corretos para os dados p√∫blicos, os dados de verdade e os casos de teste, e ent√£o substituir os dados p√∫blicos pelos dados combinados.




<!-- ### Usar o Dataset do HuggingFace

Voc√™ pode baixar o dataset do HuggingFace usando o seguinte comando:

Content:
```bash
from datasets import load_dataset
# Load the flash version of the dataset
dataset = load_dataset("birdsql/bird-interact-lite")
print(dataset["lite"][0])

# Load the full version of the dataset (coming soon)

print(dataset["full"][0])
```
Translation:
```bash
from datasets import load_dataset
# Load the flash version of the dataset
dataset = load_dataset("birdsql/bird-interact-lite")
print(dataset["lite"][0])

# Load the full version of the dataset (coming soon)
dataset = load_dataset("birdsql/bird-interact-full")
print(dataset["full"][0])
```

Content: Or you can use the provided script to download the full version of the dataset and split it into different dialects.
Translation: Ou voc√™ pode usar o script fornecido para baixar a vers√£o completa do conjunto de dados e dividi-lo em diferentes dialetos.

Content:
```bash
cd baseline/data
python pull_data.py \
  --schema_path path/to/full_schema.jsonl \
  --input_path path/to/input.jsonl \ # Path to the input JSONL file (may be empty if you want to download the dataset from HuggingFace)
  --output_folder path/to/output_dir # output folder of the split files
``` -->
Translation:
```bash
cd baseline/data
python pull_data.py \
  --schema_path caminho/para/full_schema.jsonl \
  --input_path caminho/para/input.jsonl \ # Caminho para o arquivo JSONL de entrada (pode estar vazio se quiser baixar o conjunto de dados do HuggingFace)
  --output_folder caminho/para/output_dir # pasta de sa√≠da dos arquivos divididos
```

Content:
The details about running **a-interact** can be found in `./bird_interact_agent/README.md`; and **c-interact** can be found in `./bird_interact_conv/README.md`.

## üìã Todo Lists

- [x] Release lite version, bird-interact-lite (270).
- [x] Release conversational version, bird-interact-conv.
- [x] Release agent version, bird-interact-agent.
- [x] Release Full bird-interact-full (600).

## Acknowledgement
We would like to express our sincere gratitude to **Irina Saparina**, **Mohammadreza Pourreza**, **Mehdi Bouzouina**, **Hailong Li**, **Jiatong Shi**, and Professor **Shinji Watanabe** for their fruitful discussions and valuable insights that helped improve this project.

## Created By:
BIRD Team & Google Cloud








## Change Log

- [2025-11-06] üêõ **Bug Fix** & üê≥ **Docker update**: Update the sqlglot version to 26.16.4 to fix the bug that the sql parser cannot parse the SQL correctly for user simulator. You could fix this by re-install it by `pip install sqlglot==26.16.4` in the `bird_interact_eval` env. The `bird_interact_eval` image is also updated, so you could also pull it and recreate the `bird_interact_eval` container.
- [2025-10-21] üê≥ **Docker update**: Add the docker for Full DB Env. And we pushed 3 docker images (Base/Full DB Env and the evaluation environment for both `a-Interact` and `c-Interact`) to Docker Hub to facilitate the environment setup. No need to download the DB dumps and build the images manually! Please pull the latest images from Docker Hub and recreates the containers, e.g. using `docker compose down -v && docker compose pull && docker compose up -d --force-recreate`.
- [2025-08-22]  üêõ **Bug Fix**: Fix the bug that when evaluating phase-2 SQL, the stored phase-1 SQL cannot be executed successfully, leading to a lower success rate of Phase-2. This bug only affects those tasks where phase1 sql does some operations on the database, e.g. CREATE table, etc.
Translation:
Os detalhes sobre como executar **a-interact** podem ser encontrados em `./bird_interact_agent/README.md`; e **c-interact** podem ser encontrados em `./bird_interact_conv/README.md`.

## Registro de Altera√ß√µes

- [2025-11-06] üêõ **Corre√ß√£o de Bug** & üê≥ **Atualiza√ß√£o Docker**: Atualize a vers√£o do sqlglot para 26.16.4 para corrigir o bug em que o analisador SQL n√£o consegue analisar corretamente o SQL para o simulador de usu√°rio. Voc√™ pode corrigir isso reinstalando com `pip install sqlglot==26.16.4` no ambiente `bird_interact_eval`. A imagem `bird_interact_eval` tamb√©m foi atualizada, ent√£o voc√™ tamb√©m pode baix√°-la e recriar o cont√™iner `bird_interact_eval`.
- [2025-10-21] üê≥ **Atualiza√ß√£o Docker**: Adicionado o docker para o Full DB Env. E enviamos 3 imagens docker (Base/Full DB Env e o ambiente de avalia√ß√£o para ambos `a-Interact` e `c-Interact`) para o Docker Hub para facilitar a configura√ß√£o do ambiente. N√£o √© necess√°rio baixar os dumps do DB e construir as imagens manualmente! Por favor, baixe as imagens mais recentes do Docker Hub e recrie os cont√™ineres, por exemplo, usando `docker compose down -v && docker compose pull && docker compose up -d --force-recreate`.
- [2025-08-22]  üêõ **Corre√ß√£o de Bug**: Corrigido o bug em que, ao avaliar o SQL da fase 2, o SQL da fase 1 armazenado n√£o pode ser executado com sucesso, levando a uma taxa de sucesso menor na Fase 2. Esse bug afeta apenas as tarefas em que o SQL da fase 1 faz algumas opera√ß√µes no banco de dados, por exemplo, CREATE table, etc.
